means: 解释( interpret的过去式和过去分词 )
演绎（按自己的感觉演奏音乐或表现角色）

sentence.Network_en: The economic crisis was interpreted in diametrically opposing ways.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于这场经济危机有着截然不同的解释。

sentence.Network_en: He quickly interpreted to us what the Russian was saying.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很快把那个俄国人所说的话翻译给我们听.

sentence.Network_en: The figure of the Ancient Mariner has been variously interpreted.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于《古舟子咏》中的人物,一直有着各种各样的理解.

list.abs: 翻字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 翻译〖 translate;interpret〗 翻译〖 interpreter〗 翻印〖 reprint〗.
解释器（Interpreter）：用于实现小型语言解释器的体系。与组合模式相似，而且常常利用组合模式来实现语法树的构建迭代器（Iterat…
园林景观专业英语词汇 ... installation 安装 interpretation 注释，解释 invasive species 入侵物种.
MEET美式教育-我的未来我做主 ... Direct English 直捷英语 Interpretation 口译 TEM4 英语专业四级.

entry.def: If you interpret something in a particular way, you decide that this is its meaning or significance.

example.ex: The whole speech might well be interpreted as a coded message to the Americans...
example.tran: 整个演讲完全可以看成是在向美国人传递编码信息。

example.ex: The judge quite rightly says that he has to interpret the law as it's been passed...
example.tran: 法官说他必须按照该法的立法初衷来阐释它，这完全没错。

entry.def: If you interpret what someone is saying, you translate it immediately into another language.

example.ex: The chambermaid spoke little English, so her husband came with her to interpret...
example.tran: 女服务员几乎不会说英语,因此她丈夫跟着来给她做翻译。

example.ex: Interpreters found they could not interpret half of what he said.
example.tran: 口译员们发现他说的话他们连一半都翻译不出来。

means.word_mean: 1. understood in a certain way; made sense of;

sentences.sentence: "an open door interpreted as an invitation"

auth_sentence.content: That is to say transfinite set theory interpreted geometrically.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is to say transfinite set theory interpreted geometrically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is to say transfinite set theory interpreted geometrically.

auth_sentence.content: The interpreted pattern is what you perceive as smell.
auth_sentence.res_content: The interpreted pattern is what you perceive as smell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The interpreted pattern is what you perceive as smell.

auth_sentence.content: I presume it will be interpreted in China as that.
auth_sentence.res_content: I presume it will be interpreted in China as that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I presume it will be interpreted in China as that.
